entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
